text: 5:21 1 Korin 6:9; Efesus 5:5; Kolosi 3:6; Akar Mogomem 22:15Egha dɨpar onganiba apava onganigha, pura gumazamiziba isa pamtemɨn diava ighiar kurabar arazibagh ami. Egha arazir kurar maba uaghan kamaghɨn iti. Kɨ fomɨra ia mɨkemegha gɨfa. Egha kɨ datɨrɨghɨn akar kamra ua ia mɨgei. Gumazamizir arazir kabagh amiba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven mangan kogham.
